page.title: 16ARTS AND CRAFTS - DATCHWORTH
page.content: {ARTISTS AND WRITERS} In 1983 the Datchworth Art Group was formed. It meets regularly and runs an annual art and craft fair which has included work for sale by local amateur artists. One professional artist lives in the village and he also teaches Art to adults at Stevenage College of Further Education. There are three resident professional writers, one of whom is a writer of children's fiction. {CRAFTS} Living in the village is man who makes ornamental cane seating and a lady who designs stained glass windows. {MUSIC} Occasionally recitals, performed by local amateur musicians, are held in All Saints Church.
